entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -27.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -32.0°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 9.
